trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representa um grupo de secções relacionadas dentro de um ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections.
trans-unit.target: As definições nos ficheiros de configuração (por exemplo, o ficheiro Web. config) são organizadas em secções.

trans-unit.source: Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que alguns secções estão relacionadas, muitas vezes, é conveniente agrupá-los num grupo de secção.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroup class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O representa de classe ConfigurationSectionGroup a `sectionGroup` elemento XML, que é utilizado para secções de grupo quando estão definidos no `configSections` elemento de um ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections).
trans-unit.target: Podem ser aninhados em grupos de secção (um grupo de secção pode conter outros grupos de secção, bem como secções).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into ConfigurationSectionGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo mostra um `configSections` elemento que define os três grupos de secção aninhada: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` o sistema de configuração carrega as definições de ficheiros de configuração em objetos de ConfigurationSectionGroup.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a ConfigurationSectionGroup object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>e <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>Propriedades para aceder a secções e grupos de secção que estão contidos num objeto ConfigurationSectionGroup.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como aceder a informações de ficheiros de configuração, consulte a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Força a declaração para este <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: O método ForceDeclaration pode forçar uma <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>o objeto a ser escritos num ficheiro de configuração, mesmo que não é necessário porque já está declarado num ficheiro principal.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Força a declaração para este <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A> method forces this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>método força isto <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>declaração para serem escritos para o ficheiro se `force` é `true`.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object is required by the system.
trans-unit.target: Se `force` é `false`, esta ação pode ser ignorada se a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objeto é necessário para o sistema.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: O método ForceDeclaration pode forçar uma <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>o objeto a ser escritos num ficheiro de configuração, mesmo que não é necessário porque já está declarado num ficheiro principal.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, este pode remover um grupo de um ficheiro de configuração se o grupo não for necessário.

trans-unit.source: You might want to use the ForceDeclaration method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists.
trans-unit.target: Poderá utilizar o método ForceDeclaration para tornar um ficheiro de configuração mais portátil de um computador para outro, sem se preocupar se a declaração de grupo já existe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object must be written to the file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objecto tem de ser escritos para o ficheiro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object declaration is required.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> declaração de objeto é necessária.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> declaration is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> declaração é necessário; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object is declared.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto está declarado.

trans-unit.source: If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the IsDeclared property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o grupo de secção está declarado no ficheiro de configuração, a propriedade IsDeclared devolve `true`.

trans-unit.source: The IsDeclared property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade IsDeclared `false` se esta secção é herdada de Machine. config ou de um ficheiro de configuração principal.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> is declared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> é declarado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a propriedade name de isto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Name property value is the name of the section group that does not contain the parent section groups.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade nome é o nome do grupo de secção que contém os grupos de secção principal.

trans-unit.source: The name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade name de isto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the section group name associated with this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo de secção associado a este <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SectionGroupName property value is the full path name of the section group, including the parent section groups..
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade SectionGroupName é o nome de caminho completo do grupo de secção, incluindo os grupos de secção principal...

trans-unit.source: The section group name of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do grupo de secção deste <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objetos subordinados deste <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objetos subordinados deste <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objetos isto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> objetos isto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Indica se atual <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> instância deve ser serializada quando a hierarquia de objeto de configuração está a ser serializada para a versão de destino especificado do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Cada grupo de secções de configuração que é criado para o [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] e versões posteriores explicitamente tem de substituir este método e devolver `true`, mas apenas se o grupo de secção é válido para a versão especificada do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Grupos de secção de configuração existentes que foram criados para versões anteriores do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] não têm de ser alterada.

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de base contém uma implementação predefinida deste método que devolva sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se um implementador de grupo de secção de configuração não substituir este método, por predefinição o grupo de secções de configuração será serializado para todas as versões do framework.

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A versão de destino do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o grupo de secção atual deve ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo para esta <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class is a derived type, the Type property will return the name of the derived type that extends the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: Se esta instância de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>classe é um tipo derivado, a propriedade de tipo irá devolver o nome do tipo derivado que expande a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The type of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo deste <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The section or group is already defined at another level.
trans-unit.target: O grupo ou secção já está definido ao nível do outro.
